E

effectMute - Variable in class gameaudio.AudioPlayer
A boolean value to mute effects.
ENDBUTTON_DEFAULT - Static variable in class utils.Constants.EndButtons
This is how large the images are in the sprite sheet
ENDBUTTON_SIZE - Static variable in class utils.Constants.EndButtons
This is how large (in pixels) each button will be for overlays in the scaled game
EndButtons - Class in ui
This class is responsible for handling the creation of, and interaction with, buttons bound within the Pause Overlay

EndButtons(int, int, int, int, int) - Constructor for class ui.EndButtons

ENDBUTTONS - Static variable in class utils.LoadSave
The buttons relating to the Level Complete screen as well as Death Screen
enemiesRemaining - Variable in class ui.HUD
Integer value representing the amount of enemies remaining
Enemy - Class in entities
This is an abstract class that provides the framework for all Enemy objects in the game.

Initializes an Enemy instance
ENEMY_ATTACK - Static variable in class gameaudio.AudioPlayer
Enemy Attack sound effect
enemy_type - Variable in class entities.Enemy
The type of Enemy it is, based on the EnemyConstants
EnemyConstants() - Constructor for class utils.Constants.EnemyConstants
 
enemyManager - Variable in class states.Playing
The manager that will load/handle each enemy and if the level has been completed (every enemy killed)
EnemyManager - Class in entities
EnemyManager will handle all enemies in each level.
EnemyManager(Playing) - Constructor for class entities.EnemyManager
This class manages every entity instance that is currently loaded into the game
entities - package entities
 
Entity - Class in entities
This abstract Entity class shares functionality across all player and enemy objects.
Entity(float, float, int, int) - Constructor for class entities.Entity
Constructor class for every entity instance
EntityDriver - Class in drivers
This will test all classes in the Entity package
